dcterms:description: The Realistic Synthetic 360° dataset, also known as Blender or NeRF Synthetic, comprises eight object scenes with intricate geometry and realistic non-Lambertian materials, rendered from various viewpoints.
dcterms:title: Realistic Synthetic 360°

dcterms:creator: B. Mildenhall
P. P. Srinivasan
R. Ortiz-Cayon
N. K. Kalantari
R. Ramamoorthi
R. Ng
A. Kar
dcterms:description: The LLFF dataset comprises real scenes captured from handheld cellphones, consisting of 24 scenes with 20-30 images each, used for practical view synthesis.
dcterms:title: LLFF (Local Light Field Fusion)
